title: ICE: cat_expr Errd

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
```
src/libstd/pixelbuffer.rs:17:9: 17:49 error: internal compiler error: cat_expr Errd
src/libstd/pixelbuffer.rs:17         Box::allocate((width * height) as usize) as *mut u32
                                     ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.
note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports
note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` for a backtrace
thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box<Any>', /home/rustbuild/src/rust-buildbot/slave/nightly-dist-rustc-linux/build/src/libsyntax/diagnostic.rs:130

stack backtrace:

  10:     0x2b10d7e0ecd7 - check::regionck::visit_expr::hf2d4abacfcc313172Dd
  11:     0x2b10d7e101fa - check::regionck::visit_local::h41feec36ea413e3c7Ad
  12:     0x2b10d7e0ad65 - check::regionck::Rcx<'a, 'tcx>::visit_fn_body::hf80a275c31acd2b2fgd
  13:     0x2b10d7e95e29 - check::check_bare_fn::h5762eedc08348af84jn
  14:     0x2b10d7e8e094 - check::check_item::h4357380fc327246cMCn
  15:     0x2b10d7e94032 - visit::walk_item::h13080698802893166918
  16:     0x2b10d7f605b2 - check_crate::closure.35907

  18:     0x2b10d6587c98 - driver::phase_3_run_analysis_passes::h4373e47181b0dbd6rGa
  19:     0x2b10d656e064 - driver::compile_input::hf31a2cb5c41231c0Rba
  20:     0x2b10d661e432 - run_compiler::h64369b9f12a810cbs2b
  21:     0x2b10d661c2a3 - thunk::F.Invoke<A, R>::invoke::h3574099936702066638

  29:                0x0 - <unknown>

make: *** [_libstd] Error 101
```

This is definitely not a common usecase; I'm using make, I'm going #[no_std] and writing my own standard library. It's likely related to that I have an

``` rust
impl<T: ?Sized> Box {
    pub unsafe fn allocate(size: usize) -> *mut T {
        /* allocate stuff */
    }
}
```

And then am calling it as you see in the error, which means that Rust does not know what T should be for `allocate`.

Check out [this](https://github.com/GBGamer/handmade_hero_nostd/tree/compiler_error) for the actual code -- warning, you will need Linux and Gnu Make to compile this, I haven't written the platform specific code for Windows and non-Linux Unix yet.

'Nother warning I forgot to add: This is not actually compile-able code even without the compiler error.
